text:
McCune-Albright syndrome result in a G protein that causes the adenylate cyclase enzyme to be constantly turned on (constitutively activated). Constitutive activation of the adenylate cyclase enzyme leads to over-production of several hormones, resulting in the signs and symptoms of McCune-Albright syndrome.",GHR,McCune-Albright syndrome
Is McCune-Albright syndrome inherited ?,"McCune-Albright syndrome is not inherited. Instead, it is caused by a random mutation in the GNAS gene that occurs very
